function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent definitions and differences in intervention strength between countries","Impact":"Skewing the impact of interventions in countries with less data","Mitigation":"Increase data availability and refine coefficients to improve reliability of estimates","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis technology","People":"Global health organizations, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Global health organizations, research institutions, national governments"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimation of changes in transmission rate (Rt)","Impact":"Unreliable parameter estimates and predictions, particularly with little or no death data","Mitigation":"Use Bayesian hierarchical framework to quantify uncertainty and refine parameter estimates","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and Bayesian analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, statisticians, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Regional variations in epidemic trends within countries","Impact":"Differences in intervention impact within different parts of each country","Mitigation":"Capture regional data and adapt intervention strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, regional data collection technology","People":"Local health authorities, regional policymakers","Owner":"Local health authorities, regional governments"}]}
